intro: Pterogastra glabra, commonly known as the smooth pterogastra, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in open grasslands and sandy soils, preferring full sun exposure. Its leaves are smooth and lance-shaped, while its flowers are small and clustered in a rounded head. Pterogastra glabra is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
